title: Boracay island kick-starts its six-month makeover
text:
Boracay island kick-starts its six-month makeover 01:05
The Philippine island of Boracay started its six-month tourism closure on Thursday, as the country's government endeavors to clean up the popular tourism destination after the country's President called it a 'cesspool'.
The Philippine island of Boracay started its six-month tourism closure on Thursday, as the country's government endeavors to clean up the popular tourism destination after the country's President called it a 'cesspool'. //reut.rs/2r1PVX0
